title: For you madam. [No. 68/05] = Pour vous madame
brief_description: Cinemagazine items: New off the peg fashions for winter 1968-69 presented at the Paris Hilton; Yanick Lederle pays tribute to dancing in an exhibition of her paintings; The 1968 Grand Dessert Prize won by a young apprentice from Nice; Marie Claire Alain, the famous organist plays a Fugue in C.
